Render a default placeholder on empty data:

```js
<Table
  items={[]}
  schema={[
    {
      name: 'Name',
      attributes: ['name'],
      className: 'col-xs-4'
    },
    {
      name: 'Age',
      attributes: ['age'],
      className: 'col-xs-4'
    },
    {
      name: 'City',
      attributes: ['city'],
      className: 'col-xs-4'
    }
  ]}
/>
```

Render custom placeholder on empty data:

```js
<Table
  items={[]}
  schema={[
    {
      name: 'Name',
      attributes: ['name'],
      className: 'col-xs-4'
    },
    {
      name: 'Age',
      attributes: ['age'],
      className: 'col-xs-4'
    },
    {
      name: 'City',
      attributes: ['city'],
      className: 'col-xs-4'
    }
  ]}
  placeholder="No information"
/>
```

Render table with rowHeightSize = 'small':

```js
const publicMen = [
  { id: 1, name: 'Adam Smith', age: 60, city: 'Edinburgh', country: 'UK' },
  {
    id: 2,
    name: 'Jack London',
    age: 24,
    city: 'San Francisco',
    country: 'USA'
  }
];

<Table
  items={publicMen}
  schema={[
    {
      name: 'Name',
      attributes: ['name'],
      className: 'col-xs-4'
    },
    {
      name: 'Age',
      attributes: ['age'],
      className: 'col-xs-4'
    },
    {
      name: 'City',
      attributes: ['city'],
      className: 'col-xs-4'
    }
  ]}
  rowHeightSize="small"
  placeholder="No information"
/>;
```


Render data with `<Table />` standard format (used attributes and template properties):

```js
const publicMen = [
  { id: 1, name: 'Adam Smith', age: 60, city: 'Edinburgh', country: 'UK' },
  {
    id: 2,
    name: 'Jack London',
    age: 24,
    city: 'San Francisco',
    country: 'USA'
  }
];

<Table
  items={publicMen}
  schema={[
    {
      name: 'Name',
      attributes: ['name'],
      className: 'col-xs-4'
    },
    {
      name: 'Age',
      attributes: ['age'],
      className: 'col-xs-4'
    },
    {
      name: 'Location',
      template: person => (
        <div>
          {person.city}, {person.country}
        </div>
      ),
      className: 'col-xs-4'
    }
  ]}
/>;
```

Render with custom renderRow():

```js
const publicMen = [
  {
    personId: 1,
    name: 'Adam Smith',
    age: 60,
    city: 'Edinburgh',
    country: 'UK'
  },
  {
    personId: 2,
    name: 'Jack London',
    age: 24,
    city: 'San Francisco',
    country: 'USA'
  }
];

<Table
  className="person-table"
  items={publicMen}
  schema={[
    {
      name: 'Name',
      attributes: ['name'],
      className: 'col-xs-4'
    },
    {
      name: 'Age',
      attributes: ['age'],
      className: 'col-xs-4'
    },
    {
      name: 'Location',
      template: person => (
        <div>
          {person.city}, {person.country}
        </div>
      ),
      className: 'col-xs-4'
    }
  ]}
>
  {(person, schema, renderRow) => (
    <div key={person.personId}>
      {renderRow({
        item: person,
        itemSchema: schema,
        itemKey: 'personId',
        className: 'person-table__item'
      })}
      <div
        style={{
          background: 'rgba(244,245,246,.6)',
          borderBottom: '1px solid #e4e7ea'
        }}
      >
        Some custom block
      </div>
    </div>
  )}
</Table>;
```

Render table header cells using a custom header cell template:

```js
<Table
  items={[]}
  schema={[
    {
      name: 'Name',
      attributes: ['name'],
      className: 'col-xs-4',
      headerTemplate: field => <div>{field.name} / your custom code</div>
    },
    {
      name: 'Age',
      attributes: ['age'],
      className: 'col-xs-4'
    },
    {
      name: 'City',
      attributes: ['city'],
      className: 'col-xs-4'
    }
  ]}
/>
```

Render table with details blocks and ToggleArrow component:

```js
import _isEmpty from 'lodash/isEmpty';
import ToggleArrow from '../ToggleArrow';

const [selectedPersonId, setSelectedPersonId] = React.useState();

const persons = [
  {
    personId: 1,
    name: 'Jack',
    age: 3,
    city: 'London',
    description: 'Description'
  },
  { personId: 2, name: 'Sam', age: 5, city: 'Chicago' }
];

const toggleDetailsBlock = person =>
  selectedPersonId === person.personId
    ? setSelectedPersonId('')
    : setSelectedPersonId(person.personId);

<Table
  items={persons}
  schema={[
    {
      name: 'Name',
      template: person => (
        <div
          style={{
            display: 'flex',
            alignItems: 'baseline',
            cursor: _isEmpty(person.description) ? 'default' : 'pointer'
          }}
          onClick={() => toggleDetailsBlock(person)}
        >
          <ToggleArrow
            isHidden={_isEmpty(person.description)}
            isOpened={selectedPersonId === person.personId}
          />
          {person.name}
        </div>
      ),
      className: 'col-xs-4'
    },
    {
      name: 'Age',
      attributes: ['age'],
      className: 'col-xs-4'
    },
    {
      name: 'City',
      attributes: ['city'],
      className: 'col-xs-4'
    }
  ]}
>
  {(person, schema, renderRow) => (
    <div key={person.personId}>
      {renderRow({ item: person, itemSchema: schema, itemKey: 'personId' })}
      {selectedPersonId === person.personId && (
        <div className="bg-table__details">{person.description}</div>
      )}
    </div>
  )}
</Table>;
```
